headline: American Water Charitable Foundation and Pennsylvania American Water 2024 Food Insecurity Giving Surpasses $135,000
summary: MECHANICSBURG, Pa., December 30, 2024--The American Water Charitable Foundation, 501(c)(3) organization established by American Water, the largest regulated water and wastewater utility company in the U.S., and Pennsylvania American Water together provided a total of $135,250 in donations during 2024 to 12 food banks throughout Pennsylvania where it serves customers. Donations nearly tripled for the year, up from $46,150 in 2023.
